attributes.action: give everyone a fair price on motor insurance
attributes.additional_details:
motor insurance is out of hand ,they can charge what they like ,and are being allowed to get away with it.our policies go up every year ,and youngsters policies are astronomical, high prices.just because they are new drivers.and most of the time its the parents who are paying it for them.
                        its time to make a stand and stop this legal robbery.
